info.name: POS API Whitebox Tests
info.description: Бүх төрлийн баримт (B2B, B2C, Invoice, Receipt) болон VAT төрлүүдийг (VAT_ABLE, VAT_FREE, VAT_ZERO) тестлэх collection. Whitebox testing. Бүх баркодууд GS1 check digit шалгалт давсан.

item.name: Mixed VAT - All 3 Types in One Bill
Mixed VAT - B2B with Multiple Receipts

body.raw:
{
  "orderId": "LARGE-BILL-{{$timestamp}}",
  "type": "B2C_RECEIPT",
  "merchantTin": "{{merchantTin}}",
  "districtCode": "{{districtCode}}",
  "branchNo": "{{branchNo}}",
  "posNo": "{{posNo}}",
  "receipts": [
    {
      "taxType": "VAT_ABLE",
      "merchantTin": "{{merchantTin}}",
      "items": [
        {"name": "Бараа 01", "barCode": "3001234567892", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 1, "totalAmount": 1120, "isNhat": true},
        {"name": "Бараа 02", "barCode": "3001234567908", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 2, "totalAmount": 2240, "isNhat": true},

        {"name": "Бараа 05", "barCode": "3001234567939", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 2, "totalAmount": 11200, "isNhat": true},
        {"name": "Бараа 06", "barCode": "3001234567946", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 1, "totalAmount": 2240, "isNhat": true},
        {"name": "Бараа 07", "barCode": "3001234567953", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 4, "totalAmount": 4480, "isNhat": true},
        {"name": "Бараа 08", "barCode": "3001234567960", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 1, "totalAmount": 8960, "isNhat": true},
        {"name": "Бараа 09", "barCode": "3001234567977", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 5, "totalAmount": 5600, "isNhat": true},
        {"name": "Бараа 10", "barCode": "3001234567984", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 1, "totalAmount": 3360, "isNhat": true}
      ]
    },
    {
      "taxType": "VAT_FREE",

      "items": [
        {"name": "Татваргүй 01", "barCode": "4001234567891", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 1, "totalAmount": 1020, "isNhat": true},
        {"name": "Татваргүй 02", "barCode": "4001234567907", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 2, "totalAmount": 2040, "isNhat": true},

        {"name": "Татваргүй 04", "barCode": "4001234567921", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 3, "totalAmount": 3060, "isNhat": true},
        {"name": "Татваргүй 05", "barCode": "4001234567938", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 1, "totalAmount": 10200, "isNhat": true},
        {"name": "Татваргүй 06", "barCode": "4001234567945", "classificationCode": "1410101", "measureUnit": "ш", "qty": 2, "totalAmount": 2040, "isNhat": true},

    {"code": "CASH", "status": "PAID", "paidAmount": 50000},

item.name: Barcode - Invalid GS1 checksum (should be UNDEFINED)
